msContents.summary:
I) Gadla Gabra Manfas Qǝddus “Vita of Gabra Manfas Qǝddus” (fols. 7ra-62vb, 69ra-vb), incomplete (?) II) Taʾāmra Gabra Manfas Qǝddus “Miracles of Gabra Manfas Qǝddus”: 14 miracles, (fols. 63ra-68vb, 69vb-80ra, 87ra-vb) incomplete (?) III) Malkǝʾa Gabra Manfas Qǝddus “Image of Gabra Manfas Qǝddus” (fols. 80rb-85vb, 87ra) IV) Taʾāmra Gabra Manfas Qǝddus “Miracles of Gabra Manfas Qǝddus”: 3 miracles (fols. 88ra-94vb)
Additiones 1-6.

list.item: 8 The structure of quires cannot be established due to misplacement of folios. The last quire (8/fols. 88r-95v) is of smaller size, and may originate from another Ms.

supportDesc.condition: The spine cover is missing. The back board has been reused and is broken. The sewing is destroyed and has been crudely repaired with several modern threads and strips of textile. 88r-95v were added later and might originate from another Ms. Most folios are misplaced, some are possibly missing, the text might be incomplete. Many fols. are torn and stained with water (e.g., 32, 67, 69). Text on 70ra is partly illegible. Cuts amended on fols. 3, 14, 21, 48, 66.

person.persName: Bäkwǝrä Ṣǝyon is mentioned as the owner in Additio 4. His name is also written in a secondary hand on 60vb, 64ra, 69va, 70ra, 74va, 76va, 87ra. Several names are written in the supplication formulas in the main hands: Mäḥḍǝntä Māryām (80ra), ʾabuna Takla Giyorgis (88ra, 90rb, 92ra), ʾabuna Takla Hāymānot (94va).
